starvationevasion.sim.events

Class AbstractEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.sim.events.AbstractEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blight, Drought, Earthquake, Fire, Flood, Hurricane

    public abstract class AbstractEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a special event. Takes a land area type and applies effects to the land region based on event. T is the type of area the event effects (territory, region, etc...)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractEvent(EnumSpecialEvent eventType, Territory landArea, int duration)
      Creates a special event object

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractEvent

        public AbstractEvent(EnumSpecialEvent eventType,
                     Territory landArea,
                     int duration)
        Creates a special event object
        Parameters:
        eventType - ActionType of event this will be
        landArea - The land area (Territory, Region, etc...) this event effects
        duration - How many simulator years this event lasts

    • Method Detail

      • applyEffects

        public void applyEffects()
        Applies effects of the event to the to the landArea. This assumes the event lasts one year (due to the resolution of the simulator). When the effect is applied then the duration is decreased by 1 year.

      • getLocation

        public abstract MapPoint getLocation()
        Return the longitue and latitude location of the event. This will usually be the center of the land area.
        Returns:
        latitude and longitude stored in a MapPoint.

      • getEventType

        public EnumSpecialEvent getEventType()

      • getDuration

        public int getDuration()

      • getLandArea

        public Territory getLandArea()
